arts.ttl: Bouanga scores 3 goals -- his 2nd hat trick in 3 games -- for LAFC in 4-1 win over RSL
arts.sum: Denis Bouanga scored three goals, his second hat trick in the last three games, and Los Angeles FC beat Real Salt Lake 4-1 on Sunday night. Son, who had his first hat trick in MLS to help Los Angeles beat RSL 4-1 on the road Wednesday, has seven goal contributions in the last three games.
